import React from 'react' import checkIcon from '../assets/check-circle.png' import greenCheckIcon from '../assets/check-circle-green.png' import trashIcon from '../assets/trash-2-red.png' import editIcon from '../assets/edit-3.png' const Task = ({data}) => { return (
{data.title}

{data.title} Descripción: {data.desc}

) } export default Task
